text: My honest review of Hallway International School is that it is well-suited for students who are preparing for the AEIS exam and aiming to join Singapore government schools. The school provides a supportive learning environment where all the teachers are patient, professional, and committed to helping students succeed.
I love the teachers there, especially teacher Cho. They are all so kind ðŸ¤©ðŸ¤©ðŸ¤©ðŸ¤©ðŸ¤©
A good place to learn English and Mathematics for first time learners and international students and the location is very convenient too - An Alumni of Hallway International School.
